downloadTitle: Resource Availability Report sample diagram for Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Get a visual overview of the availability of resources in your team with this Visio 2010 PivotDiagram sample diagram.
detailsSection: Use this Microsoft Visio 2010 sample diagram to see, at a glance, the availability of resources in your team. This sample diagram uses the PivotDiagram functionality in Visio to create a hierarchical view of resource availability. It shows both the availability and assigned workloads for a consulting team as a whole, as well as details for individual resources. This sample could be extended to show active projects, location, client satisfaction, and other data of interest to team managers.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the sample diagram to your computer.
